snippet: Two fleets, one of them Chinese and the other unidentified, intrude on bluefin tuna zones as the European Union and the United States confer on regulation of illegal fishing.
abstract: Two fleets, one of them Chinese and the other unidentified, intrude on bluefin tuna zones as the European Union and the United States confer on regulation of illegal fishing.

headline.main: As Regulators Meet, Fishing Boats Thumb Their Noses
